statements: UPDATE robot_info SET robot_name = 'RoboCop' WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE robot_info SET status_updates = '{"battery": "Low"}', configuration = '{"model": "XYZ"}', created_at = '2022-04-01 12:00:00' WHERE robot_id = 2;

UPDATE robot_info SET robot_name = 'R2-D2', configuration = '{"model": "Protocol Droid", "color": "blue"}', status_updates = '{"battery": 90, "temperature": 25}', created_at = '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE robot_id = 1;

UPDATE robot_info SET configuration = '{"model": "Battle Droid", "color": "red"}', robot_name = 'C-3PO', status_updates = '{"battery": 70, "temperature": 30}', created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE robot_id = 2;
UPDATE RobotConfigurations SET robot_name='R2D2' WHERE robot_id=1;
UPDATE RobotStatusUpdates SET updated_at='2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE status_id=5;
UPDATE RobotConfigurations SET configuration = '{"key": "value"}', robot_name = 'R2D2' WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE RobotStatusUpdates SET status = 'Active', updated_at = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE robot_id = 2;
UPDATE robot_configurations SET year_manufactured = 2022, configuration = '{"color": "blue", "weight": 150}' WHERE robot_name = 'RoboX';
UPDATE robot_statuses SET status = 'ACTIVE', last_updated = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE robot_id = 3;
UPDATE robot_configurations SET year_manufactured = 2022, configuration = '{"color": "blue", "weight": "200kg"}' WHERE robot_name = 'R2D2';
UPDATE robot_statuses SET status = 'Active', last_updated = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE robot_id = (SELECT id FROM robot_configurations WHERE robot_name = 'C3PO');
UPDATE RobotConfigurations SET robot_name = 'R2D2' WHERE robot_id = 1;
UPDATE RobotStatus SET battery_level = 75.5, status_message = 'Operating normally' WHERE robot_id = 3;
UPDATE RobotConfigurations SET robot_name = 'Robo-X', configuration_details = '{"speed":"high","color":"blue"}' WHERE robot_id = 1001
UPDATE RobotStatus SET battery_level = 75.5, last_update = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE robot_id = 1003
UPDATE Robot_Configurations SET configuration = 'New Configuration', name = 'Robot A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Robot_Status SET status = 'Active', battery_level = 75, last_updated = '2022-07-01 08:00:00' WHERE robot_id = 3;
UPDATE Robot_Configurations SET configuration = 'New Configuration', created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Robot_Status SET status = 'Inactive', battery_level = 30, last_updated = '2022-01-20 15:30:00' WHERE robot_id = 5
